# Load packages 

```{r}
if (!require(pacman)) install.packages("pacman")

pacman::p_load(tidyverse, # tidyverse 
               panelr, # panel data analysis
               here, # computational reproducibility 
               glue, # gluing objects and strings 
               tidylog, # logging analysis
               naniar, # missing data 
               zeallot, # multiple assignments 
               readxl)

source(here("functions/utils.r"))
```

# Load files 

```{r}
df <- read_csv(here("processed_data", "panel_data_cleaned.csv"))
```

# Difference-in-means

```{r}

df %>%
  group_by(wave) %>%
  summarise(mean_disc = mean(apa.discrim.rona, na.rm = TRUE))

  ggplot(aes(x = wave, y = expdiscrim)) +
    geom_col(position = "dodge", stat = "summary", fun.y = "mean")

df$expdiscrim
```
